idea: Our core product is Crunch Rocks -  Crunch Rocks are munchies, which can be enjoyed anytime and anywhere. name: RUSTOM HOSPITALITY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
In context to India’s need for sanitation, JUGAL MISTRI ARCHITECTURE has designed a unique solution in the
prefabricated space called “AIRBOX TOILETS”. This cost effective, low environmental impact project looks at an adaptive
reuse of old shipping containers. With universal sizes of 20 and 40 feet, these containers albeit their rigid outlook, have
the potential to radically transform into creative architectural expressions. Made to withstand extreme ocean weather
and to carry tons of cargo across the world, the robustness of containers provides a secure habitable framework.

The design intent for “Airbox” is to fundamentally change the perception of public infrastructure which is primitive and
awfully pragmatic. Design tools such as “slice”, “lift” and “tilt” helped convert the appearance of a brutally ordered box into
an inspiring urban object. Stench and suffocation inherently keep people away from using public toilets. By slicing and
elevating a 20 feet shipping container, Airbox has created a natural passage of air from underneath that flows out from
above the toilet cubicles. This tilt creates an expanded space internally adding a sense of “lightness” and generating twice
the amount of airflow without using a single exhaust fan. Thus – Airbox.

Knowing that a rural landscape hugely differs from that of an urban one, Airbox has ensured that the interiors are
customisable both in terms of facilities and costs to meet requirements of the landscape these toilets are deployed in.
With its versatile nature, Airbox can be deployed on highways, railway platforms, public spaces and schools catering to
the urban workforce.
name: AIRBOX TOILETS

idea:
We have introduced a new category in the beverage industry.


We are manufacturing and marketing ready to drink, non- alcoholic, caffeine-free mocktails which are made with cane sugar . Traditionally only syrups were available to make mocktails,where now we have innovated and stardardized the process and flavours to get mocktails in packaged format so the consumer can get a consistent taste and flavour which is also convenient.


We have also improvised on the Mixer category of beverages to suit the Indian palette.


Our beverages are manufactured in a State Of The Art ISO plant, thus generating employment at the manufacturing level and also on the sales and distribution side.


We are focused on creating a Make In India brand to get global recognition and thus create employment and wealth for all stakeholders in the ecosystem
name: DARSHAN DADIA

idea:
Our vision at Amics is to reimagine and evolve the way teaching and learning have been happening for decades. By combining quality teachers, engaging content and superior technology we are able to create a superior learning experience for students and aid in their outcome improvement, which is unlike any offline experience.
Smart Learning is India's upcoming Online tutoring company which enables students to learn with some of India's best-curated teachers.
Smart Learning brought by Amics Games Private Limited works with an objective of educating people along with involving them in recreational activities. In the era of this digital world, the Company is developing an application which helps students to learn concepts in quick and easy manner. The Application focuses on building the imagination power of students by solving the puzzles, riddles, and short questions like MCQ’s, fill in the blanks, one-word answers based on student’s respective state educational boards and Universities including Maharashtra board, Gujarat board, Karnataka board, IB board, ICSE board, Mumbai University, Bangalore University etc.
We, by our services, enhance the value of education by creating awareness in parents regarding the course and the subjects their students need to focus more. It is a simple and basic mobile application that is user friendly with all category of people as it provides the data in multiple transliteration language which helps the students as well as the parents to understand things quickly. The multiple features of application attracts the attention of the users towards the current affairs, interesting facts and the alarming issues.
The Company covers all region of India and thereby reaching all students to facilitate them for quick studies and revision of their courses. The combination of studies and games makes it more interesting for students.
name: AMICS GAMES PRIVATE LIMITED
